title: Fix authentication bug
description: Users are experiencing intermittent authentication failures. Need to investigate and fix the auth flow to ensure reliable login functionality.

title: Add password reset functionality
description: Implement a password reset feature that allows users to securely reset their passwords via email verification.

title: Competitor analysis
description: Conduct comprehensive analysis of main competitors' features, pricing, and market positioning to identify opportunities and gaps.

title: User research study
description: Plan and conduct user research interviews to understand pain points, needs, and usage patterns. Synthesize findings into actionable insights.
